original: Konradsson, Hugo Otto, distriktsveterinär, Torup, f. 13/6/03 i Gåsborn, Värml. 1., av folkskoll. Gustaf K. o. Anna Lundbom. G. 34 m. Karin Ham-lin. Barn: Bo Hugo f. 37, Karin Margareta 39. — Stud:ex. i Skara 22, ve-ter:ex. 32. Distr :veter. i Torup fr. 39. Hobbies: måln., skulptur. Skytte-GM, Pist:skytteGM.
translated: Konradsson, Hugo Otto, district veterinarian, Torup, b. 13/6/03 in Gåsborn, Värmland. Son of elementary school teacher Gustaf K. and Anna Lundbom. Married to Karin Hamlin in 1934. Children: Bo Hugo b. 1937, Karin Margareta b. 1939. Completed high school in Skara in 1922, veterinary studies in 1932. Worked as a district veterinarian in Torup from 1939. Hobbies include painting and sculpting. Champion in shooting, both in general and pistol shooting.
